entry.title: sense and sensibility
entry.content:
sense

as a normal student of OE,sometimes i found myself too sense on things.actually,noone wouuld know whts’s fuck you are thinking about.people always judge a man by the thing he completed and the words he spoke out loudly.if a word never spoke out,the promise is flase;if a action is never complete,the process just process.

sensibility

felling in other words is sensibility ,every creature have a sense of this psychological activity.but it’s rather horrible in human mental things,maybe too many words decribe our emotions,too many images show our sensibility,however,indeed,we could not exactly tell these things in a precise word or image.

sense&sensibility

combian two of these,a novel written by Jane austen ,which told a story of 2 young ladies ’s love .In sense & sensibility,older sister Eilinor succed in pursue her true love with her inherent rationality . anyway,the story was seted in long long ago,nowadays,too many things push us into a big mixture life.YOU found yourself nowhere,women and men when facing the financial problem ,just the very same as acients. yes,money not so super in some occasion turn to be poweless.

True fellings(sensibility) maybe tell the difference.

entry.title: postcrosing
entry.content:
a little about postcrossing

my jun postcrossing:

surprise

however ,i don’t know the postcard before i got it ,postcrossing is very powerful in this information era. i really afraid of information ,mostly because it watse our real time in virtual space. maybe someont think friends in real life is more important in communicating. **yes,it does! * when we are in a vey noraml place with normal friends.

  • what confused us is growing up,because everyone became a lie teller along his/her elder age.
  • some of my colleague always question me about my oral english, and criticized why talk so much with a foreigner but not a colleague.what’s more ,why always keep so quite in a conversation.

i think i am a paranoia with truth and pravicy

many of us really like gossip ,that’s why ‘’ gossip girl ‘’ so hot . and in our culture ,gossip about other’s privacy life seemly to be common. i ’d like to talk with a foreigner mostly because they respect your privacy. that sholud be a relationship of two strangers!

what about friends?

  • yes, that’s my problem: i fond myself hardly to make friends with others,i need too much information to issuse a good friend’s relation,but very easy to break one.

  • i’ve read too many books to discover this psychological situation ,and ways to fix it . books is books . real life is real life ,simple and complex inverse.

  • YOU can find me at 微薄

  • YOU can find my faverite books ,music and films at 豆瓣

entry.title: 谁的人生
entry.content:
言语之庭

新海诚果然是这种清新派的高手，一丝一语，无不赋予美景与眼神之中，所有的孤单与坚强似乎只是在雷雨才得以宁静，而生活在别人那里还是陌生的，人类应该是最可怕的一种生物，言语比沉默更能伤害一个心灵。言语上的伤害只需远离就可，沉默上的伤害只需忘记就可。但是无论如何远离是孤单的开始，忘记则是新的开始。

  • words sometime show nonsense
  • you should be slow to living a life
  • you should be slow to impress friends
  • you should be slow to judge others

entry.title: Dig hole for living
entry.content:
源

因为每次沟通的时候，我都是被骂的对象。所以我现在的状态就是无法去和别人沟通，对于和人的沟通变成了一种’负担’，一种‘逃避’。 我当然不想去这样，生活不过是一种随机的状态，我们个体无法从中获得社会化的效果。 然而社会化的思维又让人发疯，人都会自私，都会‘长大’，所有的小孩子最终都变成了口蜜腹剑的小人，谎话也无法让他获得罪恶感.

恼

我们烦恼的标志则是我们看到太多好的，坏的东西，三观的崩塌，罪恶和苦难却无法摆脱这种‘束缚’。 性格和潜在的价值观在社会化的过程中被潜移默化的加工成了一种无奈，长期这样，就开始‘自闭’，‘不自信’，无法从生活中走出来，无法集中精神去做好一件事。

我不讨厌我周围的人，因为我和他们是在维持一种‘非利益’的友谊关系，而且尽量使这种关系变得简单。我也不讨厌亲人，因为我‘欠’他们太多.

lovely dog
